name: GOOD MAN
description:
OVERVIEW

Attempt to find all the documents in a dark maze while being hunted by a creature.

GAMEPLAY

Good Man is a challenging game, but it is possible. To win, you must collect 3 documents scattered around a large maze. However, if you are caught by the creature lurking in the maze, you will have to start over.

DEVELOPMENT

This game was developed in Unity in 2 days as a passion project
